Description:
A Spacious Family Home in a Top Location
Absolutely enticing to all, this fantastic home is beautifully situated in one the best pockets of Derrimut. Behind the striking facade awaits a superb selection of formal and informal zones, highlighted by open-plan casual living and dining.
Features 4 bedrooms a comfortable main bedroom retreat with ensuite and walk -in wardrobe, a 2nd, 3rd & 4th serviced by a light filled central bathroom. Further features include; well appointed kitchen with stone benches, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down-lights throughout and double garage.
Located in one of Derrimut's most coveted locations, this outstanding residence is only 20 minutes to the CBD and has every modern day requirement at your disposal.
With size and space for all, close to all amenities with local shops, parklands, schools, public transport and the Western Ring Road only moments away, your new home in the booming suburb of Derrimut awaits. Call us now to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 18 Sherrington Grange, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
PERFECT PORTER DAVIS
It is not often that you will find a property available that will tick all of your boxes when searching for your new home, look no more! Leaving nothing for you to do except move in, this Porter Davis home
has everything a growing family needs. Offering a perfect combination of lifestyle and quality living this home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms with the good sized master bedroom
tucked away behind the front study & is complete with his & her walk in robes and large ensuite complete with double shower. All remaining bedrooms are of good size with robes.
This stunning residence also features 3 separate living areas including a large formal lounge, well-appointed kitchen boasting walk-in pantry, quality stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops, adjacent meals and family area plus a separate rumpus room ready for the home cinema or pool table.
Blessed with an abundance of further features which include the comforts of ducted heating and evaporative cooling, moderns tones, wide hallway, high ceilings, double garage with internal access and immaculate presentation throughout. Don't delay, arrange your inspection today .
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Nader Iskander : 0414 243 472

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
By renowned builder Metricon, this absolute beauty packs plenty of punch with its oversized spaces and brilliant location providing an enviable lifestyle with the vibrant Derrimut Village and all it has to offer only a few steps around the corner. A massive kitchen with adjacent dining area overlooks the expansive main living area that spills out to the low maintenance paved rear yard. Sleeping quarters comprise a luxurious master bedroom at the rear of the property with ensuite and double BIRS stretching its entire length and 2 additional bedrooms again of great size serviced by the lovely central bathroom. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, high ceilings, solar panels, low maintenance front and rear gardens and double remote garage with internal access.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Just one word WOW. This truly special residence combines a contemporary and sophisticated interior highlighted by gorgeous flooring with a magical backyard oasis you could only dream of featuring extensive decking, pergola and mature lush gardens. The home comprises of 3 spacious bedrooms plus separate study that can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom, 2 sensational bathrooms and huge kitchen that overlooks the dining ,main living area and rumpus that all lead outside incorporating all these areas with the rear yard forming an enormous indoor/outdoor zone when entertaining. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioner, designer lighting, alarm, security cameras, quality window furnishings, double remote garage and double exposed aggregate driveway. The home you have always dreamed of, the only one you have ever really wanted is finally on the market.

Description:
Modern Charm with Parkside Poise!
First home buyers, couples and families will be suitably impressed by this beautifully proportioned single level home. Enjoy open plan living with elegant timber Kitchen well equipped with s/s appliances and gas burner cooktop.
The open floor plan delivers 3 generous size bedrooms with BIR's, serviced by a bright central bathroom, master with ensuite, open living area adjoining meals and well appointed kitchen. Step outside to a low maintenance backyard, perfect for entertaining family and friends. Further features split system, floor boards throughout & double garage.
Positioned in one of Derrimut’s most coveted locations close to Derrimut Village shopping centre, schools and freeways.
Will Hoblos 0413 403 199 or Gioan Pham 0422 804 082

Description:
Prime Position, Low Maintenance Opportunity!
A rare opportunity to secure this well presented, good sized family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 20 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move or investment. Comprising of three generously sized bedrooms including spacious master featuring en-suite with the remaining bedrooms also offering built-in-robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the open plan living/dining room and remaining bedrooms, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a concreted entertaining area and good sized rear and side yard. Features include; double lock-up garage, security doors, stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating & cooling. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often, don't delay and enquire today!
Scott Perry : 0439 595 461

Description:
Attention All Investors and First Home Buyers
Situated in one of Derrimut's finest pockets and within a short distance to public transport, schools, parkland and easy access to Western Free Way is this stunning home. Boasting formal lounge leading to the hub of the home featuring a hostess kitchen overlooking the dining/family area.
The generous sized bedrooms with B.I.R (master with a full ensuite and W.I.R.) are serviced by a central sparkling bathroom. Step outside to the covered decked entertainment area overlooking the manicured gardens. Further complementing the home is a double remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alarm. Currently tenanted returning approx $1516 per calendar month. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Brilliantly located providing the convenience of being just around the corner from schools, community centre, parkland and transport yet situated in a quiet family friendly street, enjoy the peace and quiet of coming home every day to your very own little slice of paradise, otherwise known as 27 Upton Circle Derrimut. The home comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs ( theatre/ lounge room can be easily converted into a 4th Bedroom), master with built in desk, WIR and ensuite with oversize shower, open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooks the dining space, 2 large living areas and alfresco. Other features include ducted heating, split system cooling, high ceilings, stone benches in kitchen, alarm, video intercom, E-screen and blockout blinds, downlights , double remote garage with internal access and so much more. With everything already done for you just move in, relax, grab a drink and sit on your alfresco looking out to your great sized rear yard with lovely mature trees and flowers and think this couldn't get any better.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
As you enter this magical residence prepare to float away into an abyss of absolute luxury and indulgence. With no expense spared, this homes quality is impressively matched by its superb floorplan that offers discrete sleeping quarters complimented by amazing indoor / outdoor living spaces. The convenience of an outstanding location at the end of a no through road that spills directly onto parkland and just a few further steps to the Derrimut Village further enhances this ultimate lifestyle package. The superb 2pac kitchen features thick stone benches, 900mm appliances, gorgeous splashback, soft closing cabinetry, WIP and triple stacker door to the huge decked alfresco area, and overlooks the step down dining and main living area that is highlighted by a feature gas fireplace, bulkheads and hardwood flooring. Feel like you are spending every night in a 5 star hotel with the master bedroom featuring state of the art ensuite including floor to ceiling tiles, stone double vanity with upgraded fittings and amazing double shower. A further 2 great sized bedrooms are serviced by another bathroom of the finest quality. A multi purpose room that can be used as formal lounge, theatre / rumpus room, study or 4th bedroom completes this masterpiece. Other features include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, decorative and square set cornices, high ceilings, porcelain tiles, downlights, lovely window furnishings, mirrored robes, alcoves and niches, double remote garage with internal access, bonus storage space and shelving and so much more.
Insights: 6 Ivy Close, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
Indoor- Outdoor Family Sensation!
This cherished family home (32 squares approx.) in a popular, family friendly neighbourhood presents a great opportunity. The combination of comfort, impressive proportions and timeless appeal culminate in a home that offers both formal and informal living spaces, perfect for all families.
The warm and inviting interior comprises a spacious formal lounge. Flowing on from the lounge room is the kitchen, boasting an extensive amount of cupboard space, including butler’s pantry, stainless steel appliances and a superb meals area. The family room offers another restful place to gather and access through large glass doors to the covered massive pergola and private backyard, the ideal place to enjoy that morning cup of coffee. Adding to the clever floor-plan is a spacious rumpus area.
Highly accommodating, there are 4 bedrooms in total, two with ensuites and all with built in robes. Centrally located between the bedrooms, the separate family bathroom and shower room is a thoughtful design and ensures the morning rush is kept to a minimum. Inclusions: heating throughout, cooling throughout, tinted windows for privacy and efficiency, colour bond roof, sensor alarm, solar panels, watertank, built in study nooks throughout, double lock up garage & shed/workshop.
Sitting on 777m2 approximately of prime real estate. With unrivalled convenience at your doorstep, walk to shops, parks & public transport. Moments from schools & easy freeway access for a short commute to the CBD.
Auction Saturday 19th December at 2.00pm
Gioan Pham 0422 804 082
Insights: 3 Rothesay Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Be Quick... Owner Says Sell It!
Occupying a wonderfully discreet plot this excellent example of contemporary design, incorporating vast open spaces, modern finishes, and wonderful connection to the outdoors. Featuring distinct living zones, this property offers an expansive open plan family lounge, meals and kitchen area.
Combining the interior with the exterior superbly the central family lounge opens out directly to the undercover alfresco domain, Fully equipped with built in BBQ, weather proof speakers, with the benefit of stained decking and a low maintenance rear yard perfect for fabulous functions outdoors! Cleverly zoned to provide the maximum in lifestyle options, parents will adore the additional formal lounge/theatre room perfect for family movie nights! All four bedrooms feature built-in-robes & study are serviced by a modern family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry facilities. While the master bedroom enjoys relaxed privacy at the opposing end of the home, featuring a fabulous walk-in-robe and luxurious private ensuite. All of the bedrooms are complimented by plush carpeted flooring. Noteworthy highlights include: ducted heating/cooling, drought tolerant landscaping and a double garage with internal access.
Constructed in solid brick veneer this newly built home (only 7 years young) ticks all the boxes for contemporary living! Boasting a superb location with excellent access to western ring rd, Schools, Derrimut Village shopping centre, Parklands, Sunshine golf course and all major amenities this is a property not to be missed, enquire today!
Auction Saturday 5th December at 1.00pm
Contact Edward Herdegen 0401 946 597

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Positive first impressions are assured with this homes striking facade providing great street appeal but it is upon entering that you will truly appreciate the absolute perfect presentation and sense of space with the welcoming wide entrance and soaring high ceilings being just a taste of what is to come. Comprising 4 bedrooms, the luxurious master featuring WIR and sensational ensuite featuring double vanity, stone benches and oversize shower while the other 3 bedrooms offer BIRs and are serviced by another high quality bathroom. Georgeous Caesar stone kitchen, with enormous island bench, 900mm appliances and glass splashback overlooks the dining and extra oversized living area that spills out to the large paved outdoor entertainment space and rear yard. A lovely formal lounge room/theatre room, separate study and double remote garage with internal access complete the home. Other features include, ducted heating, 3 split systems, down lights, low maintenance landscaped front and rear gardens, storage shed and so much more. With everything already done for, just move in and start enjoying modern living at its finest.

Description:
Family Pleaser, Investment Perfect
A rare opportunity to secure this great sized family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 15 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move or investment. Comprising three generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR & en-suite and two remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and a spacious lounge, perfect for any host to entertain. Features include; stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, downlights, security door and all situated on a 314m2 (approx.) allotment are a few of the many extras available. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often, please call today for an inspection.

Description:
A Joy to call Home
An inspired design and a credit to the builder is this spectacular one of a kind residence.
Setting a new benchmark in luxury family living. This rare imposing residence is a contemporary lifestyle masterpiece that oozes Live, Play & Entertain.
This breathtaking home even enjoys a spectacular lifestyle location within minutes to local shopping and cafes, parkland, public transport, schools and easy access to the Western Ring Road. Comprising of Master Bedroom with built-in robes and ensuite.
The Remaining bedrooms have fitted built-in robes and are serviced by a sparkling central main bathroom.
Impressive polished concrete Flooring, split systems, stainless steel European appliances are just a taste to what is on offer from this ultimate property. Inspections are a must.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
The home you have always dreamed of but can never find is now on the market. An absolute credit to its current owners this magnificent single storey residence provides everything you could ever wish for and more. At approximately 32 squares, its impressive size is matched by the huge number of standout features you are greeted with at every turn. Ingeniously designed, the quality kitchen with glass splashback, stone benches , WIP and 900mm appliances overlooks the family , dining and formal lounge with all these areas encompassing the magical alfresco area with bi-fold door which when opened creates an enormous indoor/outdoor zone. Other highlights include luxurious master bedroom with WIR and oversize shower, double vanity ensuite and a sensational theatre room to the rear. Additional features include 3 more bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a quality main bathroom, separate study or nursery just off the master bedroom, enormous garage with remote and rear roller door access to undercover carport for a boat, trailer or caravan , ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security alarm system, high ceilings, down lights, established mature gardens with great size rear yard, top of the range solar panel system, quality window furnishings, indoor/outdoor speakers and so much more. All this on a massive allotment of approximately 624sqm in a great location right around the corner from all amenities.
